Class Brick

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Brick

public class Brick
extends greenfoot.Actor

A brick sits there looking colorful until the ball breaks it, adding the value of the brick to the user's score.

Version:
December 8, 2012
Author:
Cody A. Ray

Constructor Summary
Brick(Brick brick)
          Copy constructor creates a new brick with the same color and value as the given one.
Brick(java.awt.Color color, int value)
          Create a new brick with the given color and value (points added to the user's score when broken).
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          Bricks don't do nothin'
 int getValue()
          Returns the value to be added to the user's score when broken.
 void hit()
          A hit breaks the brick, removing it from the jail and adding its value to the user's score.
